name: Death Is Key (0neofthoseguys)
description:
Arrow Keys To Move, R to Reset

You are an explorer in an Egyptian Pyramid. You find an artifact but become cursed in the process to turn into stone. Luckily for you, the artifact allows you to revive and slow the curse. Can you escape?

Instructions: You have a certain number of moves to escape but can reset it by dying.

Credits:

Start Menu Theme:Desert - 8 Bit Chiptune Ambient Music by David Koronkay

Main Game Music: Pyramid (NES)

End Screen Theme: 8-bit Desert Tune by OkamiDeluxe

Made for Jame Gam #23
